issues.description: The IsStudentView parameter is defined but not used in the component. The MessageDisplay component always shows the off-topic indicator regardless of this flag.
File is JavaScript (.js) but project constraint TC-007 specifies TypeScript for client-side scripting. Consider renaming to .ts and adding type annotations.
